network_device_id.description: Guid for the network device. Must match an instance of Network Device schema.

network_port_id.description: The ifAlias of the interface of the network device.

peer_device_id.description: Guid for the peer device, which could be either a network device or an endpoint. Must match an instance of Network Device or Endpoint schema.

peer_port_id.description: The ifAlias of the interface of the peer device. For Endpoint as peer, this can be empty or the port_id

speed.description: Speed of the link. Formatted as number followed by kbit/s, Mbit/s, Gbit/s.
